## Analysis

The force applied on the beam with a particular weight can be found by summing the moments about the pivot point $a$ to zero, keeping in mind that counterclockwise moments are positive and clockwise moments are negative:

$$
\begin{gather}
\sum M_a = 0 \\
n \ W + m \ F = 0 \\ 
\textnormal{mass} = - \frac{m \ F}{n \ g}
\end{gather}
$$

where $g$ is the acceleration due to gravity.
